snippet: With a $6.2 billion accounting charge, Microsoft is essentially writing off the value of the aQuantive advertising business it purchased five years ago.
abstract: With a $6.2 billion accounting charge, Microsoft is essentially writing off the value of the aQuantive advertising business it purchased five years ago.

byline.original: By QUENTIN HARDY and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Microsoft Takes Write-Down in Failed Digital Ad Foray
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Takes Write-Down in Failed Digital Ad Foray
